page.title: 07Home Life
page.content: {The Family} Our family is a close one,particularly Uncle Frank and Aunty Heather who live quite near to us.Uncle Frank has heart problems and Aunty Heather has just had an operation on her neck so we try to do every thing for them.Uncle Frank is dads brother and he has a son Roger who is 26 years of age. Mum and Dad are friendly with all their brothers and sisters but the only people living in our house are Mum and Dad my brother,Colin and myself. I am called Sharon,I go to school and Colin goes to{Holme Lacy } {Agricultural College}while Mum and Dad work on the farm. At weekends we often go out or maybe have visitors if we have no other jobs that need doing.Most families who have moved into the area came because it is
